data.persona: these warrior have bones in their ears their hair and even their noses.
data.description:
You are in the Treasure Room.
It is home to all the most valuable and legendary pieces of fortune that have been collected by the kingdom over hundreds of years. It contains many treasure chests filled to the brim with gold. Necklaces strewn about made from every type of valuable material imaginable. Legendary swords made from the greatest sword makers in all of the lands. Pieces of armor worn by the mightiest warriors that have ever lived are lined up meticulously on one of the walls.
There's a treasure chest, a Piece of fortune, a piece of armor, a tapestry, a gold, a sword, a Necklaces, and a magical crystal here.
The queen and the prince are here.

You are carrying a tomahawk and a knife, wearing a Bone, and wielding a bow.

data.short_motivation: I will give the tomahawk to the queen to show my battle victories.
data.mid_motivation: I will receive gold from the queen when she sees how I've valiantly fought in the name of her Kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I need lots of gold pieces to buy my family a new dwelling in the Kingdom.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get treasure chest key from queen

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use treasure chest key with treasure chest

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get gold pieces from treasure chest
